FuncDef: The display bgp sr-policy peer command is used to display the information of the specified BGP SR-Policy address family.
Examples: Total number of peers : 1                 Peers in established state : 1
Peer            V          AS  MsgRcvd  MsgSent  OutQ  Up/Down       State  PrefRcv
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp sr-policy peer command is used to display the information of the specified BGP SR-Policy address family.
